title: Sample sheet format for --input
description: Sample ids with reads paths and metadata

R1.description: Path for R1 reads with (.fastq, .fq), can be gziped. Spring files accepted.

R2.description: Path for R2 reads with (.fastq, .fq), can be gziped.

ref_genome.description: Id of the reference genome from --ref_genomes.

anchor.description: Id of the anchor to use from --anchors.

class_dbs.description: Semilocon-separated list of classification databases --class_dbs for iterative removal of reads

class_tool.description: Classification tool to use for iterative removal of reads

assembler.description: Semilocon-separated list of assembly strategy from "spades_rnaviral","spades_metaviral","spades_corona"

realign.description: Whether to realign reads vs assembly

do_abacas.description: Whether to perform abacas with the provided reference (if any)

keep_before_abacas.description: Whether to keep scaffolds before abacas to Quast

dedup.description: Whether to perform deduplication before assembly

keep_before_dedup.description: Whether to keep reads before depud to generate both assembly before and after dedup

ref_proteome.description: reference of the proteome in --prot, to apply hannot pipeline (after abacas)

keep_before_hannot.description: Whether to keep scaffolds before hannot to Quast
